info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:16PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Teller and southwestern El Paso Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 415 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Carson, or 8 miles southwest of Colorado Springs. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Colorado Springs and Fort Carson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
